details:
Packages contain automated downloading and starting of an executable, which seems to be just a putty instance from a URL controlled by the author. It does not appear to have any harmful activity, but the downloading & starting of the application happens without user clear consent.


---

Category: SPAM - advertisements, spam packages etc.
Campaign: 2024-08-old-anonimtest-putty
Reasons (based on the campaign):
 - Downloads and executes a remote executable.
